name: StasisVR
description:
StasisVR is an action shooter about stopping time to destroy robots and drones.
Please note that this is a prototype build and is constantly being worked on. 

Compatible with: Oculus Rift, HTC Vive, Valve Index and Windows Mixed Reality

If you are interested, make sure to check out the game on its social media pages
Twitter
Discord

Feel free to leave feedback in the comments below
